name: artiomshosting-bot
description: ArtiomsHosting bot v2 is a sophisticated Discord bot that functions as a comprehensive hosting service manager. It operates as a third-party software solution for Pterodactyl Panel, providing efficient management of server and user creation, modification, and deletion. Furthermore, the bot incorporates the API nest, enabling third-party websites to seamlessly interact with the integrated database.
author: JustArtiom
